page.title: 17A Child's Day, Snape, Yorks.
page.content: My name is Natalie, I am 8 years old and I live in Snape. I get up at 8 a.m and get dressed then I eat breakfast. I have toast and honey or cereal, sometimes I have beans and sausage.At 9 a.m. school starts.We have Assembly, then I do maths. After playtime I do English.Lunch lasts an hour.In the afternoon I paint, make models and work.When playtime is over we have story.Then I go to my Nan's house.On a nice day I swing, rollerskate or play games.When it rains I stay inside. I have tea at 4.30 p.m. Then I go home, play with my friends, ride my bike or rollerskate. Then I get bathed, have supper and go to bed about 9 p.m. When I am in bed I sometimes read.
